/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. A red car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a pop of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer.
